title: அலிகார் 2 வயது சிறுமி கொலையை மறைத்த ஊடகங்கள்! - எல்லை மீறும் சமூக ஊடக வதந்தி!
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: The horrific murder of a little girl in Aligarh, UP has shocked and disturbed me. How can any human being treat a child with such brutality? This terrible crime must not go unpunished. The UP police must act swiftly to bring the killers to justice.
